parameters

Class Parameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • parameters.Parameter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoiseParameter, TactileDistractorParameter, VisualDistractorParameter

    public abstract class Parameter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class implementing the core functionalities of all the parameters affecting the experiment. A parameter will alway be enable by default and therefore be played. However the designer can decide to disable a parameter for a particular block.
    Author:
    Jean-Etienne Salois, Philippe de SÃ¨ve
    See Also:
    Experimentation, Block, Serialized Form

      • orderOfPlay

        public abstract java.lang.Object[] orderOfPlay(int seed)
        Implements the behavior of the parameter when it is to be played during a block. The function uses a seed to generate a random sequence of stimulus to be played.
        Parameters:
        seed - the seed used to generate the stimulus sequence
        See Also:
        Block
